revised_title: John Rishbeth: A Pioneering Plant Pathologist
tldr: John Rishbeth was a renowned plant pathologist who specialized in forest pathology and the biological control of soil-borne plant pathogens. His research focused on understanding the biology and ecology of these pathogens, leading to effective methods of disease control. Rishbeth made significant contributions to the field of plant pathology and was a dedicated educator and researcher.
